ygData.subject: RE: Cleric Behaviour
ygData.msgSnippet: Er, it is still quite RP to buff and heal an inkie if they don t want it. Isn t it RP for a follower of Karana (or whatever) to want to go against the wishes
ygData.messageBody:
Er, it is still quite RP to buff and heal an inkie if they don't want it.
Isn't it RP for a follower of Karana (or whatever) to want to go against the
wishes of a follower of Innoruuk?

Elbeno
15 times blessed by Karana
Bristlebane

> -----Original Message-----
> From: The Scotts [mailto:jtscott@...]
>
> No immature is when you give a player all your buffs just
> becuase they
> wanted to RP and didn't want your help and yes it does ruin the Rping
> enviroment. And we are not going ot turn this into some kind
> of blown out
> argument just becuase you think that my life is this game.
